price: Olúwa wa, dájúdájú Ìwọ l’O mọ ohun tí à ń fi pamọ́ àti ohun tí à ń ṣe àfihàn rẹ̀. Kò sì sí kiní kan nínú ilẹ̀ àti nínú sánmọ̀ tó pamọ́ fún Allāhu.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ تَعۡلَمُ مَا نُخۡفِي وَمَا نُعۡلِنُۗ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka taʿlamu mā nukh'fī wamā nuʿ'linu wamā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min shayin fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
